SummaryEnglish: Set during Japan's Taish≈ç era (1912-1926), a girl named Haru Asagi works as a maid of the Miyanomori family, which is headed by one of Japan's most powerful magnates. However, the family head suddenly announces that he is retiring, so one of his six sons must assume control of the family.

1.SummaryEnglish: Haru works as a maid for the Miyanomori family. The head of the clan is a powerful man in Japan in the Taisho Era. He has six sons from different wives and he will name the heir of whoever makes him the happiest.

2.SummaryEnglish: Haru works hard as maid for the Miyanomori family and her relationship with the six brothers become more difficult.
